label.string: Clinician Checklist
Is there objection to home visit?

group.p: Document consent in the file. Visit not to be conducted until appropriate consent obtained

label.string: Is the venue for home visit different to the address on the patient label?

group.p: Ensure address documented on top of form. Ensure risk screen is completed for residence to be visited. If the location for visit changes, or visits are to occur at more than one residence, complete risk screen for each address.

label.string: Explanation and Comments:
Is there anything in the medical record to indicate that there may be risks associated with conducting a home visit?
Explanation and Comments:
Do you need to provide any hands on assistance to patient to assist with mobility?

group.p: Ensure No Lift procedures are adhered to

label.string: Do you know the health status of occupants/visitors?
Are evening visits appropriate?
Patient And Household Occupants
Does patient have a history of psychiatric, violent, aggressive or inappropriate behaviour?

group.p: Discuss with Head/Chairman who will then assess the safety of the situation prior to the visit, following clarification of behaviours

label.string: Does the patient have a history of significant alcohol or drug use?
Are there any occupants or frequent visitors?
Will they be present for visits?

group.p: Request that non essential visitors not to be present at time of visit

label.string: Do they have a history of psychiatric, violent, aggressive or inappropriate behaviour or significant drug or alcohol use or an infectious health condition?

group.p: Discuss with Head/Chairman who will then assess the safety of the situation prior to the visit, following clarification of behaviours

label.string: There is a female family member/caregiver to chaperone female visiting staff and a male family member/caregiver to chaperone male visiting staff?

group.p: Patient/ family member must ensure that there is available chaperone during home visit

label.string: Do household occupants smoke?

group.p: Request they refrain from smoking during the duration of visit

label.string: Animals & Pest
Are there any animals inside the house?

group.p: Phone ahead (if required) to ensure animals are placed elsewhere at time of visit

label.string: Have you requested that animal(s) be placed elsewhere whilst HC staff are visiting?

group.p: Advise that animals must not be in the same room as HC staff. Phone ahead (if required) to ensure animals are placed elsewhere at time of visit

label.string: Is there pest or rodents infestation?

group.p: Advise to get exterminators for pest/rodent control

label.string: Animals & Pest Explanation and Comments:
Access To Property (External and Internal)
Are the road conditions dangerous (e.g. unsealed or busy road)
Is it difficult to find the house ( obscured by trees or not numbered?
Are there any difficulty in accessing the property?
Is the path to the front door even and non slip?

group.p: Staff need to wear appropriate footwear and be made aware of conditions prior to visit

label.string: How many steps are there to the front door?
Is the entrance well lit?

group.p: Call ahead to ensure light is on, take torch in good working order

label.string: Is there adequate street lighting?

group.p: Take torch. Park as close to the house as possible

label.string: Is the lighting within the house adequate?
Are the floors stable and clear of obstacles, which may impede access?

group.p: Advise patient/family that obstacles must be removed prior to visit. Do not access areas where flooring is unstable

label.string: Is the ventilation within the house adequate? (e.g. presence of window in the room)
Is air-conditioning/heater adequate within the house?
Is the entrance wide enough for wheelchair access?
Is kitchen appliances adequate (stove, refrigerator, sink)
Is laundry facilities available?
Is the toilet/bathroom accessible for wheelchair?
Are safety rails available?
Access to Property Explanation and Comments:
Fire/Gas/Electrical Hazard
Is a fire extinguisher available?
Is there a smoke/fire detector available?
Are grounded electrical wall socket available?
Are there any difficulties getting mobile phone reception?
Are there any difficulties getting mobile phone reception?
